attributes.additional_details: Watership Down appears to be a nice cartoon about fluffy bunnies, but it is far more sinister and is quite frankly disturbing for little children. I myself cannot even listen to 'Bright Eyes' without filling up, more than 30 years after watching this horrifying film. The Government should immediately reclassify Watership Down as an 18 certificate to spare future generations from being mentally scarred for life.
